title: NLCS: Bryce Harper Is Building His Legacy With Phillies
description: Harperâ€™s two-run home run in the eighth inning gave this city something few expected: the 2022 N.L. pennant.
dc:creator: Tyler Kepner
media:description: Bryce Harper was a phenom as a teenager, and signed a $330 million deal with Philadelphia in 2019. He is delivering on all expectations.
